event: Earliest human presence on the island of Hispaniola
TaÃ­no societies develop agriculture and chiefdoms
Santo Domingo is founded as the first permanent European city in the Americas
Spanish colonial society consolidates around sugar plantations
Spain cedes western Hispaniola to France

Spain regains control of eastern Hispaniola

Haiti occupies the eastern part of the island
Dominican Republic declares independence from Haiti
Spain briefly recolonizes the Dominican Republic
